price: ߥߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߝߙߍ߬ߞߍ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬؟ ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߝߙߍ߬ߞߍ߬ߓߊ߰ߕߐ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
